content: The app works well for now. The Pro version does what it says. Will see how it behaves in the next few days and will feedback if there's an issue. Good job!
Very easy to use and very effective

‚Äì Needs to run at all times. If you close the app, it won't run in the background anymore and the dimming will stop immediately. ‚Äì If you close the app and open it again, it will ask you to enable accessibility permission again in the settings (even though it's still enabled!) ‚Äì No filter color configuration. OLED screens will look blue when dimming with this app (great for sleeping! I'm sarcastic blue light prevents you from sleeping, which makes this app pointless).
Honestly, the best app on my phone. Enables me to use my phone at night without being blinded by the brightness of my screen and bothering my spouse by my screen's light.
Works great on my S8. I use it every day in the evening to lower the brightness of my display beyond what the regular brightness settings allow. Allows me to wind down before bed.

Great value for sub-0 brightness on oled screens at night. Not good for video at sub-0, causes bad smearing on moto z2 play and pixel 4a, but that's more related to the oled hardware than this software.
Best App To Lower Your Brightness To The Max So I Can Watch & Play My Games Without Hurting My Eyes
Very good and useful app for when your are in a very dark room. The full darkness/notification controls are definitely worth the $2.50 if you are going to use it a lot.
Does not work. Will be asking for a refund

Edit: very finicky with android 10, the accessibility switch in the app won't change no matter if the accessibility service enabled or not. Works for the rest of the screen but that defeats the purpose of paying for it right.. App not working with accessibility service on newer Android versions, possibly OEM related. Android 10, MIUI 12, status bar isn't dimmed at all, or notification shade. Works on p20 pro android 9
App no longer working with accessability service galaxy note10 so it doesnt dim status bar etc...

Wonderful app that really helps with my migraines. Has started having issues though, have to go into accessibility settings and disable and reenable permissions for it every time to use it, or it doesnt work. this bug is the only reason im not giving 5 stars.

This is very useful app. I was using the lite version for some time but it was a hassle going in the app to turn it on. The widget in home screen makes a huge difference and allows to turn it on and adjust brightness instantly.
This app should be included when buying your phone. Great app!! Runs extremely smooth.

I damaged my screen on my device and now when it does below 80% brightness, it flickers. This app allows me to dim the screen without triggering the flickering. The effect looks a little bizarre on LCD screens because of their backlights, but on an OLED display, it's almost as good as native brightness control. It's not perfect, however- sometimes details in some images are lost due to how the dimming works, but a lot of those details are hard to spot when the device is natively dimmed anyways.

app seems to be not running in the background,when i open the app,and close it even from the recent apps,sceen filter is gone,have to activate again via quick tile or open the app and keep it in recent apps.just bought the app,can this be fixed??
Great app. All it's missing is a timer for automatically dimming during certain hours.
Perfectly does what it has to. Nothing more or less
Advertisement on the pro version
Does everything is says it does. Have had 0 problems with it. Easy to use and super handy. First app I've ever spent money on.

Does exactly what it's supposed to do without ever and without flaw. exactly what I was looking for and a small cost considering what it can do. been looking for a way to get the screen brightness down as it is still way too bright in dark environments. Thank you for a fantastic app
Wonderful app! Super useful for reading at night. Been using the free version for a while -- upgraded to the full version to enable dimming of notification menu, and it works great!
App stop working after a few weeks. I've wasted my money for the pro version when the normal version works better and doesn't malfunction.

Works like a charm - and thank you very much for creating this functionality. The lowest light on a newer galaxy phone is ridiculously high in a dark room. However, you really need to disallow anything below 10%. Or at least have a prompt or a checkbox to enable it (though I can't think of a use case for 0% I can't think of why it should be totally disallowed either). At 0% my screen is completely black, even in a completely dark room. So if I let go of the slider I would have to restart.
no updates for the app, still an old version without updates
Been using it for years. Best feature is that it also dims the notification panels.
Works beautifully, dims even notification bar and absolutely everything (after enabling it in the Accessibility settings). A must-have for anyone with sensitive eyes! Nokia 7 plus / Android 9

So far, so good. It does exactly what it says on the tin. I've tried multiple "dimming" apps and to be totally honest, this is the only one that completely dimmed my screen. And by that I mean the navigation bar, notifications panel, etc. The only caveat is that you'll need to pay for the "Pro" version in order to get this feature, but for the fairly inexpensive price, I'd definitely recommend this app to anyone looking to dim their screen without having to bother about other useless apps.
Was working ok on olld phone. Now changed to miui 11. Not working
After a few weeks it always says service is mulfunctioning and doesn't work, always have to uninstall and download again.

Good app, it helps me to avoid of phantom images on the screen of my xiaomi mi5. But i found one bad thing, Google Pay can't work properly if permission for drawing over other apps is on. For example I can't add my bank card to Google Pay with message: looking like another app is blocking access to Google Pay.
Finest appüòÉ thanksüôè

Sometimes you close it and it stops working, even though it has an ability to autostart itself and the system doesn't enforce any battery policies on it, I toggled these two options manually in the settings.
Broken in Android 10 with the force dark mode override developer option turned on (makes the screen brighter instead of darker)
replyContent: We've released the new version (1.9.4) with fully support dark mode. Thank you so much for the comments and your feedback.

content: Amazing experience but doesn't work with the dark mode on the Android 10 Please update it quickly... I have the full Pro version installed
replyContent: We've released the new version (1.9.4) with fully support dark mode. Thank you so much for the comments and your feedback.

content: The ful scree dim option is not working properly. The widget is not responding sometimes. When recent apps are closed it is becoming disabled and coming to normal brightness..Not satisfied purchase of pro version
I am using paid verson. After rebooting phone every time I need to launch this app manually otherwise it will not start.

Wow, been looking for a tidy screen dimmer for my s10 plus, it's way to bright at night even with night mode, lowest brightness setting and blue light filter just made things unreadable, I used the free version but upgraded pritty much straight away, a simple to use app that's great, you dont have to mess about at all especially with the widget it's super easy, on and off with plus and minus for easy control. I will add would be great to have it on a timer to come on or automatically in dark A**

Even at low brightness, AMOLED sceeens are too bright at night! This app helps a lot. simple app with two toggles, and a slider for brightness. i like the simple UI. I set it to around 35% thats good between still able to read at night and not super bright üëÄüëå
The app will randomly lower the main brightness in Device Settings - Display on my S9. Very annoying. Also, screenshots look very dark. If you have S9 running Oreo....STAY AWAY!!
i love this app. can't live without it. my only concern is that my screenshots get also darker when the app is activated
Paid for the no ads version but you still get them, no point, waste of money
replyContent: Sorry for your inconvenient. Please uninstall free version before using paid version. We haven't integrated ads in paid version so it never shows ads in paid version.

content: Worth the price.
The functionality is excellent. However whenever screen is off, the app is not running in background. So when scree on, every time need setup all settings again and again... 20 times a day...
this is just perfect. worth it!!!
works
Perfectly simple app. I would like a black background notification interface option.that is all

Works perfectly with my LG V30+. The only screen dimming app I found that could dim the WHOLE screen including system areas (notification area, buttons, etc.), taking the net brightness below system's 0 (zero) brightness. This actually works for Oreo. It does exactly what it says without too many bells and whistles and frankly I like the simple spartan interface. The perfect dimmer-only app.
Working very well for android 8.1.0 oreo...Thank you very much...
i think need min. 20% for opacity. because i have accident with swipe until 0% opacity. dark screen. i restart my handheld. sorry for bad english
some bug in Android 8. some times didn't work.
suuuper useful. wish it had a build in timer. so it can bd automatically triggered to the night mode.
absolutely best screen dim app on Google play... sooo worth buying pro version works perfectly. so glad to have found this app.
Needs to start with boot up.

Great app! HOWEVER I would appreciate if the app had a cleaner layout when opening to lower the brightness (it looks like an old version of Android from 2012). As for the new widgets great job! Hope for more content to come.
Free app was good bit didnt dim notification screen. Paid for pro version and no adds, dims everything easily! And inexpensive! Worth every penny!
Great app i install this app
Works well with my Essential PH-1's Night Mode for the perfect balance of low brightness and lack of blue light. Widgets are good. Well worth the price for the Pro version.

Thanks for finally making this! I've been waiting a while for a pro version. Love the new features. I think a disable option would be nice on the notification, and a more material design or less obtrusive design for the widget would look better. But I absolutely love this, thank you :) Update: thanks for adding the disable option. Love the accessibility service so much!
This app would be perfect if it had a built in automatic brightness setting (sort of like. LUX). Otherwise good application.

Great app. Is it possible to have a night mode for the settings so we don't 
get a blinding white screen when we launch the app? Thanks the pro version 
is otherwise perfect
Best brightest ever.

Notification adjusting is fidgety and it often brings me into the Lower 
Brightness App anyway when making multiple taps to adjust. I await further 
improvements.

Pro version is much better. Can you do something about the icon? Simplicity
